meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6517.

td.p: Lee Ann Roberts, a homemaker from Albuquerque, New Mexico
Matt Ruprecht, an actuary from Hamilton, New Jersey
Ashok Poozhikunnel, an underwriter from Wheaton, Illinois (whose 3-day cash winnings total $65,602)

tr.td: GUINNESS RECORDS
THE 6 NEW ENGLAND STATES
IT'S MATTHEW PERRY
HOCKEY TALK?
DOUBLE-ZERO YEARS
WEB CEREALS
